mapper.insert:
select hotel_seq.nextval from dual
insert into hotel (hseq, name, content, image, location, hgrade, roomcount, hash, place, thema) values (#{hseq}, #{name}, #{content}, #{image}, #{location}, #{hgrade}, #{roomcount}, #{hash}, #{place}, #{thema})
mapper.select: select * from hotel order by hseq
mapper.update: update hotel set name=#{name}, content=#{content}, image=#{image}, location=#{location}, hgrade=#{hgrade}, hash=#{hash} where hseq=#{hseq}
mapper.insert:
select room_seq.nextval from dual
insert into hotel_room (hbno, rseq, title, options, price, content, image) values (#{hseq}, #{rseq}, #{title}, #{options}, #{price}, #{content}, #{image})
mapper.select: select * from hotel_room where hbno=#{hseq} order by price
mapper.update: update hotel_room set title=#{title}, option=#{option}, content=#{content}, price=#{price}, image=#{image} where title=#{title}
mapper.select: select h.name,h.content,h.hgrade,h.hash,h.hseq,h.image,h.location,h.roomcount, h.place, h.thema, h.best, r.hbno,r.title,r.content rcontent,r.image rimage,r.price, r.options from hotel h, hotel_room r where h.hseq=r.hbno and h.hseq=#{hseq}order by r.price

select h.name,h.content,h.hgrade,h.hash,h.hseq,h.image,h.location,h.roomcount, h.place, h.thema, h.best, r.hbno,r.title,r.content rcontent,r.image rimage,r.price, r.options from hotel h, hotel_room r where h.hseq=r.hbno and h.hseq=#{hseq}and r.price = (select min(r.price) from hotel h, hotel_room r where h.hseq=r.hbno and h.hseq=#{hseq})
